about_the_game:
Deadlands Lost Colony: A Billion Miles from Home!

Space isn't just "the final frontier" in Deadlands: Lost Colony, it's downright frightening! Especially when it's written by John "Night Train" Goff! The first sneak peek at Lost Colony, A Billion Miles from Home, sends your spacers to the outer fringes of the Faraway system to discover the fate of the long-lost Bosphorous. What terrors lurk aboard her frozen halls? And why do they call this region of space "Johnson's Folly?"


A Billion Miles From Home is a Savage Tale for the
Savage Worlds roleplaying game system and a preview of Deadlands Lost Colony, complete with pregenerated characters. Only a copy of
Savage Worlds Adventure Edition is required.
Converted by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
